attributes.action: Stop immigrants claiming benefits immediately on arrival
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Immigrants can immediately claim benefits when entering this country, making it a british "Eldorado". The goverment needs to stop this immediately.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop immigrants claiming benefits immediately on arrival."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21578


Prime Minister's Office
